title: Losing Connection
body:
i lost connection for 10 min , i tried to reconnect but it doesn't work ,so i left the game to reconnect  and complete the match ,after a while i reconnect and continue the match , i won the match and the game ended ,so the system put me in the low priority queue .
In this situation is it right to be in the low priority ?
and why should i wait for 20 min and i didn't do anything wrong i was totally working rules

replies.body: Even if you try to come back to the game, you can still get marked as a leaver for being gone too long.  It's really important to try and resolve whatever is causing this d/c, though.  Are you getting any error messages?  What's happening as it happens?
I randomly keep losing connection as well just started happening today it's not my internet . when i try to shut down the game to join again it locks up my pc. any ideals?
